attributes.action: BRING IN FREE BUS PASES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE UNDER THE AGE OF 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BRINGING IN FREE BUS PASES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE UNDER THE AGE OF 18 WOULD ENCOURAGE FAMILIES TO USE PUBLIC TRANSPORT AND MAKE IT EASIER FOR YOUNG PEOPLE TO GET TO SCHOOL, COLLEGE AND CONSTRUCTIVE ACTIVITIES SUCH AS PARTICIPATING IN SPORTS, VISITING LIBRARIES AND OTHER PLACES OF INTEREST. IT IS UNFAIR THAT YOUNG PEOPLE AGED 15 AND OVER ARE CHARGED AS ADULTS ON PUBLIC TRANSPORT WHEN THEY AREN'T OLD ENOUGH TO WORK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
